info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 25 at 5:29PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A heavy plume of snow will impact portions of west central Allen County through 615 PM EST... At 518 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a snow plume near Fort Wayne, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Low visibility and quickly accumulating snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous driving. This snow plume will be near... Fort Wayne around 525 PM EST. This includes Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 305 and 308. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Take caution if driving through this area. Be prepared for rapid visibility reductions and snow accumulations on roadways.
